award_name.en: Ministry of Economics, Trade, and Industry

description.ja: 制御システムのセキュリティ分野において、先行する世界標準や評価認証制度を国内に取り込み、専門である機能安全や信頼性の知見を生かし、様々なプロジェクトにおいて主導的な立場での活動を行った。また、技術研究組合制御システムセキュリティセンターを立ち上げ、理事長として、日本初の制御システムセキュリティマネジメントシステム認証制度のパイロットプロジェクトの立ち上げなど、制御システムのセキュリティを確保するための諸活動に尽力し、我が国の情報処理の安全性の確保に大きな貢献を果たした。

paper_title.ja: SICE International Standardization Activities for future Low-Carbon + Smart Society
paper_title.en: SICE International Standardization Activities for future Low-Carbon + Smart Society
Activities for Control System Security in Japan

description.en: This paper presents an activity related to Control System Security. The control system works every place in the society, including power source, factory, building, home, and so on. The controllers are connected to Internet through an engineering tool on a general O/S, for example Windows. Therefore, vulnerability of the general O/S and the tool may become that of controller. STUXNET attacked this security hole in 2010. Security Task Force is made by METI in 2011. And Control System Security Centre established in 2012 succeeds the work of the TF.

paper_title.en: VISUALIZATION OF MULTI-CAHNNEL VITAL DATA AT ENGINE IDLING BASED ON WAVELET ANALYSIS

description.en: This paper presents an analysis and a visualization method of vital signals of a passenger, during engine idling. The idling signal is analyzed and suppressed in order to detect a pulse caused by heartbeats and make them visible by wavelet analysis. The measured vital signal is contaminated with an engine idling signal, and it is needed to be separated in a time-frequency band by using wavelet transformation. This paper also proposes a visualization method of 18 channel vital signals with wavelet analysis. An experiment result shows effectiveness of the proposing analysis and method.
